duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the continuous flow of product according to set standards and escalate Jidoka issues as needed.
Ensure line startup according to checklist and identify risks and quality rejections for immediate improvement.
Execute operations based on supervisor instructions, ensuring compliance with regulations and maintaining discipline.
Monitor deviations from standards and KPIs on the production floor.
Provide technical expertise in back-end operations, including TPM and preventive interventions.
Administer resources, prioritize activities, and ensure compliance with applicable regulations.

education_certification.credential: Technical or Bachelor's degree in Manufacturing, Maintenance, or related field
